Body: Website | Whitepaper | ANN THREAD   Telegram Bounty Program  http://tinyimg.io/i/QnZ8B9n.png   http://tinyimg.io/i/L41LgsO.png   http://tinyimg.io/i/qiHQUT4.png   ICO Details  1 ARBI token is equal to 0.01 ETH. Author: CCF
Title: [ANN][ICO] Arbi - ICO Escrow Service #1
Body: How do you prove that your multisig will not be compromised? We offer offline licensed escrow-agents. For more information you can visit our site.

Author: dominikas18
Title: [ANN][ICO] Arbi - ICO Escrow Service #1
Body: You cannot create a smart contract that takes into account all the scenarios and works absolutely autonomously, there is anyway a need in human in decision-making process.

Body: Hello! I did not understand, but where is the reference to the bounty program, what are the conditions? Or did not have time to make and decorate?

Author: alexdead
Title: [ANN][ICO] Arbi - ICO Escrow Service #1
Body: Smart contract can be good substitution of escrow only if it covers all possible situations during and after ICO, otherwise investors and startups are not protected from erroneous refund.
